title: Canva Lead Magnet Design - PDF
job_overview:
About the Role:

I'm looking for a creative, detail-oriented Canva designer who can help me turn a written document into a beautifully designed PDF lead magnet. The content is already written, I just need someone to make it visually engaging and aligned with my branding.

This is a one-off project with potential for future design work if we work well together.

Project Scope:
You’ll be designing a lead magnet titled:
"How to Say No Without Guilt: Scripts + Mindset Shifts for the Woman Who Always Puts Herself Last"

The PDF will include:

A cover page
Intro section (short and friendly)
Sections with real-life examples + script responses
A mindset shift page
A common guilt-traps page
Call-to-action to book a free call with me
Branded with my colours, fonts, and tone (I’ll provide guidance)
Approx. 6–8 pages total

What I’m Looking For:

Experience using Canva (required)
Strong design skills with a clean, feminine aesthetic
Ability to follow brand colours and typography
Able to format written content clearly and visually
Good communication and initiative
Can work independently and deliver on time

About Me:
I’m based in the UK and run a coaching business that supports women who are first-born/first-generation and often the “strong one” in their families. I’m warm, kind, and organised — and I love working with freelancers who bring good energy and a collaborative spirit!

To Apply:
Please send:
Links to your Canva portfolio or examples of past work
Your estimated turnaround time

Looking forward to working with someone who can bring this resource to life beautifully! ????

Ivy
